message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI. 

This paper deals with query-focused opinion summarization, which involves natural language processing and information retrieval techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves statistical rankers and diverse viewpoints, which are related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI). Additionally, the paper discusses community QA and blog summarization, which are related to social media and web mining (cs.SI).
